title: Looking at Britain: trainers in training
creator_credit: Maxwell Munden and Max Munden Productions
brief_description: Training athletic coaches. To make sure there will always be enough expert instruction for the youth of Britain there are several colleges where future instructors are trained. One college is Loughborough. Here teachers of physical education are taught the techniques of different sports, learning not only to be good athletes themselves but how to pass their knowledge on to others.
